ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( PrimaryContact__c ) && ( ISBLANK(PrimaryContact__r.FirstName) || ISBLANK(PrimaryContact__r.LastName) || ISBLANK(PrimaryContact__r.MailingCity) || ISBLANK(PrimaryContact__r.MailingPostalCode) || ISBLANK( PrimaryContact__r.Email ) || ISBLANK( PrimaryContact__r.MailingCountry ) || ISBLANK( PrimaryContact__r.MailingStreet ) || ISBLANK( PrimaryContact__r.MailingState ) || ( ISBLANK( PrimaryContact__r.HomePhone ) && ISBLANK( PrimaryContact__r.Phone ) ) ), PrimaryContact__c != NULL)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please review primary contact. Full name, full address, email and phone (Phone or Home Phone) are required.
